name: Loop Land
description:
There is a bug when opening fullscreen in webgl, please start the game and then go fullscreen

After a morning breakfast, young Wally suffered from a severe Frosty Loop overdose, sending him into the loop dimension. Now it’s up to you to help him escape in one piece and overcome the obstacles in the way.

Credits:
Art: Martiniano Marelli
Sound Design: Paulo Serafim
Programming: Szilágyi Mátyás
